entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023
